meanings.definition: The divine spirit or essence believed to be present in all living things.
meanings.sent1: Many people believe that the oversoul connects us all through a shared spiritual essence.
meanings.sent2: The oversoul is thought to be the universal spirit that unites all living beings.
meanings.sent3: The idea of an oversoul in every living thing can be quite comforting.
meanings.sent4: In the concept of oversoul, we are all like drops in the same vast ocean of existence.
meanings.sent5: The oversoul is like a thread that weaves through the fabric of life, connecting us all.

meanings.definition: A unifying force that connects all individuals in a collective consciousness.
meanings.sent1: The oversoul is the idea that we are all connected through a shared consciousness.
meanings.sent2: Many spiritual teachings emphasize the concept of an oversoul linking humanity together.
meanings.sent3: Thinking about the oversoul can lead to some interesting philosophical discussions.
meanings.sent4: The oversoul is like a giant web, with each person being a unique strand connected to the whole.
meanings.sent5: The oversoul is the invisible bond that ties us all together in a cosmic dance of existence.
